languages.text: "Когда имеешь дело с ксеносами, стоит быть готовыми к манифестациям всякой зловещей мистики. Среди хладных торговцев есть целая каста специалистов, умеющих зашептывать артефакты нелюдей и изгонять их духов. Может, обратимся к ним?"

"When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who use rituals to expel spirits from xeno-artefacts. Perhaps we should ask these xenowhisperers?"
languages.original_text: "Когда имеешь дело с ксеносами, стоит быть готовыми к манифестациям всякой зловещей мистики. Среди хладных торговцев есть целая каста специалистов, умеющих зашептывать артефакты нелюдей и изгонять их духов. Может, обратимся к ним?"

traits.locale_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Trades who can whisper at the abhumans' artefacts and expel the spirits out of them. Perhaps we should ask them?"

"When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Trades who can whisper at the abhumans' artefacts and expel the spirits out of them. Perhaps we should ask them?"

"When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who use rituals to expel spirits from xeno-artefacts. Perhaps we should ask these xenowhisperers?"

"When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who use rituals to expel spirits from xeno-artefacts. Perhaps we should ask these xenowhisperers?"

languages.text: “和异形打交道的时候，我们应该随时准备应对各种不祥的神秘现象。我认识一群冷市贸易专家，他们可以举行仪式，驱散那件异形造物里的幽灵。也许我们应该问问这些异形知识的专家？”
languages.original_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who use rituals to expel spirits from xeno-artefacts. Perhaps we should ask these xenowhisperers?"

traits.locale_text: “和异形打交道的时候，我们应该随时准备应对各种不祥的神秘现象。我认识一群冷市贸易专家，他们可以举行仪式，驱散那件异形造物里的幽灵。也许我们应该问问这些异形知识的专家？”
“和异形打交道的时候，我们应该随时准备应对各种不祥的神秘现象。我认识一群冷市贸易专家，他们可以与异形造物交流，驱逐居住在其中的幽灵。也许我们应该问问他们的意见？”

languages.text: «Al tratar con xenos, no es extraño ver la manifestación de todo tipo de misterios ominosos. Hay toda una casta de especialistas entre los Comerciantes Fríos que usan rituales para expulsar espíritus de los xenoartefactos. Quizá deberíamos preguntar a los xenosusurradores».
languages.original_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who use rituals to expel spirits from xeno-artefacts. Perhaps we should ask these xenowhisperers?"

traits.locale_text: «Al tratar con xenos, no es extraño ver la manifestación de todo tipo de misterios ominosos. Hay toda una casta de especialistas entre los Comerciantes Fríos que usan rituales para expulsar espíritus de los xenoartefactos. Quizá deberíamos preguntar a los xenosusurradores».

languages.text: 「ゼノを相手にするときは、あらゆる種類の不吉な謎の兆候に対処する備えをしなければなりません。コールド・トレーダーには、ゼノのアーティファクトに囁きかけて中にいる精霊を追い出す専門の階級があります。彼らに尋ねてみるのはどうでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who use rituals to expel spirits from xeno-artefacts. Perhaps we should ask these xenowhisperers?"

traits.locale_text: 「ゼノを相手にするときは、あらゆる種類の不吉な謎の兆候に対処する備えをしなければなりません。コールド・トレーダーには、ゼノのアーティファクトに囁きかけて中にいる精霊を追い出す専門の階級があります。彼らに尋ねてみるのはどうでしょうか？」
「ゼノを相手にするときは、あらゆる種類の不吉な謎の兆候に対処する備えをしなければなりません。コールド・トレーダーには、ゼノのアーティファクトに囁きかけて中にいる精霊を追い出す専門の階級があります。彼らに尋ねてみるのはどうでしょうか？」

languages.text: « Quand on a affaire à des xénos, il faut s'attendre à toutes sortes de manifestations inexpliquées et de mystères inquiétants. Il existe, parmi les adeptes du Commerce Froid, une caste de spécialistes capables d'utiliser des rituels pour en chasser les esprits. Peut-être devrions-nous faire appel à ces xénophones ? »
languages.original_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who use rituals to expel spirits from xeno-artefacts. Perhaps we should ask these xenowhisperers?"

traits.locale_text: « Quand on a affaire à des xénos, il faut s'attendre à toutes sortes de manifestations inexpliquées et de mystères inquiétants. Il existe, parmi les adeptes du Commerce Froid, une caste de spécialistes capables d'utiliser des rituels pour en chasser les esprits. Peut-être devrions-nous faire appel à ces xénophones ? »

languages.text: "Im Umgang mit Xenos sollte man auf die Manifestation allerlei finsterer Geheimnisse gefasst sein. Es gibt unter den Kalthändlern eine ganze Kaste von Spezialisten, die mit ihren Ritualen Geister aus Xeno-Artefakten vertreiben. Vielleicht sollten wir diese Xeno-Flüsterer fragen?"
languages.original_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who use rituals to expel spirits from xeno-artefacts. Perhaps we should ask these xenowhisperers?"

traits.locale_text: "Im Umgang mit Xenos sollte man auf die Manifestation allerlei finsterer Geheimnisse gefasst sein. Es gibt unter den Kalthändlern eine ganze Kaste von Spezialisten, die mit ihren Ritualen Geister aus Xeno-Artefakten vertreiben. Vielleicht sollten wir diese Xeno-Flüsterer fragen?"

"Im Umgang mit Xenos sollte man auf die Manifestation allerlei finsterer Geheimnisse gefasst sein. Es gibt unter den Kalthändlern eine ganze Kaste von Spezialisten, die Xeno-Artefakten Dinge zuflüstern können, um die Geister darin zu vertreiben. Vielleicht sollten wir sie fragen?"

languages.text: "Zenolarla karşı karşıyayken her türden uğursuz esrarın tezahürüne hazırlıklı olmak gerekir. Soğuk Tacirler arasında zeno eserlerindeki ruhları defetmek için ayinler yapan koskoca bir uzman sınıfı mevcut. Belki de bu zenolara fısıldayanlara başvurmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "When dealing with xenos, one should be prepared for the manifestation of all sorts of ominous mysteries. There is a whole caste of specialists among the Cold Traders who use rituals to expel spirits from xeno-artefacts. Perhaps we should ask these xenowhisperers?"

traits.locale_text: "Zenolarla karşı karşıyayken her türden uğursuz esrarın tezahürüne hazırlıklı olmak gerekir. Soğuk Tacirler arasında zeno eserlerindeki ruhları defetmek için ayinler yapan koskoca bir uzman sınıfı mevcut. Belki de bu zenolara fısıldayanlara başvurmalıyız."
